title: The Blade of Frontiers
content:

Continue to travel with Wyll and Karlach.

Karlach has joined the party, though Wyll hasn't confronted her as of yet. This uneasy peace can't last forever.

With Karlach in your group opposing Wyll's original interests, you will need to speak to Wyll about Karlach.

Talk to Wyll about Karlach.

A monster hunter named Wyll confronted Karlach in our camp, believing her to be a dangerous devil. We resolved the
